alert.note: Alert for New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 4:28PM EDT until July 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR NORTHERN NEW CASTLE... NORTHWESTERN SALEM...NORTHWESTERN CAMDEN...NORTHWESTERN GLOUCESTER... NORTHWESTERN BURLINGTON...SOUTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY...CENTRAL CHESTER...PHILADELPHIA AND DELAWARE COUNTIES IS CANCELLED... The storms which prompted the warning have weakened below severe limits, and no longer pose an immediate threat to life or property. Therefore, the warning has been cancelled. However gusty winds and heavy rain are still possible with these thunderstorms. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northern Delaware...southern New Jersey...and southeastern Pennsylvania.
